;According to Xinhua News Agency and other media reports, on November 29, 2023 local time, former US Secretary of State Henry Kissing Gerard died at his home in Connecticut at the age of 100.

;

;Just two months ago, Kissinger was still mediating the conflict between Russia and Ukraine.

;

;On September 24, local time, according to the "Ukrainian Pravda" report, Ukrainian President Zelensky met with former US Secretary of State Kissinger during his visit to the United States.

;

;Andrei Yermak, director of the Ukrainian Presidential Office, posted the above news on social media.

;

; Kissinger visited China in July and also attended the Bund Financial Summit online on September 23. The Southern Weekend has launched the "Confusion of Russia and Ukraine, Centennial Kissinger's achievements and controversy | Think Tank Viewpoint", which is now pushed to show commemoration.

;

; Why is Kissinger still active

;

; Today the world is facing huge risks, which is different from all risks after the Cold War. The previous risks, whether they were sold in Afghanistan or Iraq, have occurred between the world's great powers and small and medium -sized countries, and the possibility of risk upgrades is not much. This time, it became a counterpart between the world's great powers and a strategic confrontation that occurred between nuclear powers.

;

; On the one hand, the conflict between Russia and Ukraine and the Big Western game behind it have a strong impact on the world order after the Cold War. The Russian conflict marks the severe challenges of the world order after the Cold War. On the other hand, this is also the first indirect opponent after the Cold War between Russia and the American Western camp.

;

; According to Yermark's description, Kissinger said to Zellezki when he met, "Before this war, I opposed Ukraine to join NATO because I was worried that this would start. We will see it now. The process (the outbreak of conflicts). Now, this process has reached this level, and in this case, the idea of ​​keeping Ukraine's neutrality is no longer meaningful. "

;

; This is not the first time Kissinger mentioned Ukraine to join NATO. On May 17, "Economist" published an interview with Kissinger. In an interview, Kissinger said that he supported Ukraine to join NATO. He also said: "Ukraine should continue to be protected by Europe, rather than becoming an isolated country that protects itself." For Russia, Kissinger said, "If I talk to Putin (Russia), I will tell him Ukraine stays in NATO, and he will be safer. "

;

; conflict against Russia, Kissinger calls on all parties to sit down to carry out diplomatic negotiations. He warned that there is such a risk now, that is, the military relations of large powers dominate their geopolitical considerations. The Russian -Ukraine conflict may therefore develop into a global conflict, and diplomatic negotiations will be "increasingly important."

;

; On the other hand, Sino -US relations have undergone qualitative changes from the Trump period, and conflict began to replace cooperation, becoming a theme in Sino -US relations.

;

; Therefore, the relationship between the world's great powers represented by China -US -Russian relations is very dangerous.

;

; In this context, Kissinger is increasingly worried about Sino -US relations.

;

; According to Xinhua News Agency on June 16, Kissinger said in an interview with the media that Sino -US relations are on the "cliffs" and "the current relationship trajectory must be changed." Later, Kissinger also said that the Cold War between China and the United States is now "walking on the mountain road." Kissinger believes that China and the United States "both are convinced that the other party constitutes a strategic threat. We are moving towards a big country." This is a process of "should not continue". Once a conflict between China and the United States, it will be comparable to the First World War.

;

; Therefore, Kissinger actively mediates the conflict between Russia and Ukraine and dragging the old body to visit China, which is trying to exert its heat in stabilizing Sino -US relations.

;

; Why is Kissinger?

;

; In the United States, there are also many influential strategists. There are not a few people who are worried about the international situation and try to promote the improvement of Russia -Ukraine relations and Sino -US relations. But why is Kissinger instead of others?

;

; On the one hand, Kissinger has a superstition to the United States for worship and mission. As a German Jew who escaped the Nazi regime, to hold a high position in the United States is an example of an American success story. This also makes him always grateful to the United States. He once wrote: "I can't find the same generous spirit and no malicious things anywhere in anywhere." This kind of almost emotional gratitude and worship of the United States has made him serve the United States at all of his diplomacy, and is committed to Maximize the national interests of the United States. To this end, he sacrificed his personal beliefs, and regardless of his personal reputation, he reached the height of "the life and death of the country, and because of the disaster and blessing."

;

; On the other hand, Kissinger's diplomatic achievements are more than half in Sino -US relations. Kissinger is an eyewitness and operator of America's transformation from decline to prosperity. If President Nixon had not accepted his suggestion, destroyed the Sino-Soviet alliance, and shifted the strategic focus of the United States from Asia to Europe, it would have been difficult for the United States to win the Cold War in this way.

;

; When he entered the American politics, the United States was experiencing the lowest valley after World War II, while experiencing a triple crisis of foreign strategies, economic and social. The United States cannot extricate itself in the Vietnam War; economic difficulties, the US dollar loses the ability and reputation of payment of gold; domestic society is chaotic.

;

; When Kissinger left American politics, the United States had successfully transformed China from the United States to the United States into the United States' "friendly African alliance" against the Soviet Union. Although the US dollar can no longer be free to fulfill gold, it has been tied with oil trade again, achieving the upgrade from the US dollar to the international monetary currency. The US dollar has changed from the intermediary of the world's economic and trade to the real hegemony currency, and it becomes an international currency.

;

; All these make Kissinger unique and is the myth and legend of the diplomatic community. His status and influence in international politics, especially in Sino-US relations, are irreplaceable.

;

; The symbol of the era

;

; On June 16, 2023, according to Xinhua News Agency, Kissinger said in an interview with the media that the American politics polarization, "Excessive attention" itself now itself, itself, itself In interest, if its foreign policy cannot balance the interests of the United States and the world, the United States will "be isolated."

;

; Sino -US relations turned from hostile to cooperation that year. The root cause is that both countries must respond to the threat from the Soviet Union. However, without Kissinger's knowledge and courage, it would be difficult for Sino -US relations to restart quickly in that harsh bilateral relationship. The symbolic effect produced by the overlapping interaction with the times is unable to have anyone else. Kissinger has become a symbol, a symbol of an era, and has no repeatability.

;

; Historically, it is the product of uniting the Soviet Union during the difficult period of China and the United States. When Kissinger secretly visited China, it was the rise and tough period of the Soviet Union, and it was a difficult period for China and the United States. China and the United States realized the handshake that spanned the Pacific Ocean and led the ideological gap, which not only created a foreign legend, but also stabilized the world situation at that time, but also destined the ending of the Cold War in advance.

;

; When Kissinger came to China that year, when I saw the strategic contradictions and ideological differences between China and the Soviet Union, we must contact China to fight against the Soviet Union together.

;

; In this sense, China and the United States have therefore become the biggest beneficiaries in the end of the Cold War. After the Cold War ended, both China and the United States were able to get rid of security, reduce security burden, and concentrate on developing the economy. The rise of China in the world and the rise of the United States in the Western camps complement each other. It can be said that it is Kissinger's personal luck at the turning point of Sino -US relations and the world structure.

;

; From a personal perspective, Kissinger is often called a realist, mainly because he puts strategic thinking in front of ideas. This distinguishes Kissinger from the current strategic researchers in the United States who are guided by ideology. However, he did not take ideological factors into consideration. In fact, he referred to his foreign policy principles, "free internationalism", is equivalent to the new conservativeism of the Bush period. It is a product that combines the principles of values, internationalism with national strength.

;

; It is precisely because of this free internationalism that he offended Trump and Biden two US presidents. On November 25, 2020, Trump fired Kissinger from his position as an advisor to the U.S. Defense Policy Council. However, he was not satisfied with Biden's withdrawal from Afghanistan, thinking that this was an irresponsible behavior and betrayed the US foreign policy tradition since President Wilson. One result of expressing this rhetoric is that Biden inherits Trump's approach to Kissinger.

;

; Of course, many strategist in the US strategic industry, many strategic people in Bikinh, have also withdrawn from the stage. The strategic talents of the United States and the Youth for the United States have now provoked the beams in the United States.

;

; But age is a major advantage of Kissinger. Kissinger is 100 years old and has surpassed all his friends and opponents. Kissinger is the only international politician in the world who is still active and has a significant influence. This makes Kissinger's role largely unrepeatable.

;

; Can Kissinger copy?

;

; Kissinger is the product of the times. When the times cannot be repeated, Kissinger cannot be copied.

;

; On the one hand, the form of Sino -US relations has changed. During the Cold War, the largest external threats in China and the United States were the Soviet Union. For its own security, China and the United States have established a cross -ideological gap system for the quasi -alliance system, which is in line with its own interests. Now, as China has entered the center of the world power stage unprecedentedly, Sino -US relations have also become the most important pair of bilateral relations.

;

; On the other hand, the characteristics of the era of diplomacy have changed. Kissinger represented by realism, advocating personal factors, superstitious secret diplomacy. At the end of the Cold War, it was out of place.

;

; Kissinger was obsessed with that passion and burning years, and was intoxicated by the thrills and excitement of taking a plane from Pakistan to Beijing to Beijing. In the later Cold War, especially in the era of highly transparent and public self -media, these personal heroism diplomatic behaviors were difficult to reproduce.

;

; In fact, Kissinger's influence in the United States is much faster than in China.

;

; In the new era, many Americans have also reflected and challenged the contribution and achievements of Kissinger. Hans Morgan, a well -known international relationship scholar, said long ago that Kissinger, like Odysseus in Homer, "has many faces."

;

; In the United States, there are two descriptions of Kissinger: one is a scammer. This person has never told the truth, and has always talked about the ambiguous words. It may be one of his secrets in the international constitution. The second is that Kissinger is a amazing person with great memory. He is a kiss and dictionary of many major events. Christopher Hetchins's description of Kissinger may be more accurate, saying that Kissinger is "a shocking scammer with great memory."

;

; Finally, a little dangerous. Compared with Kissinger during the Cold War, the current American strategists basically grow up in a peaceful atmosphere. For them, peace is no longer the primary goal of international politics, but the premise or background of international politics, which does not need to fight and pay the price. Therefore, we can see that compared with Kissinger's concerns about the prospects of conflict, many American strategists seem to be concerned about the possibility of conflict.

;

; Therefore, Kissinger will not have the second one, but Kissinger's worry crisis will continue to repeat.
